name: Civil Service Job Grades
description: The civil service job grade(s) at which a role is often performed.

name: URL
description: URL to an online resource providing further information on an entity.

name: Awareness Level Capabilities
description: List of the capabilities demonstrated at the awareness level for a skill.

name: Working Level Capabilities
description: List of the capabilities demonstrated at the working level for a skill.

name: Practitioner Level Capabilities
description: List of the capabilities demonstrated at the practitioner level for a skill.

name: Expert Level Capabilities
description: List of the capabilities demonstrated at the expert level for a skill.
